Subject: Death of a tyrant
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Inferno fell to the ground with his face scourged by the fumes of Star 
Scream. He got up and looked over, the last of the clones fell to thr ground. 
He was all that was left. Taking out his gun he made a tactical withdrawl 
until he saw Megatron, the clone.
    "Royalty! You have come for me! Together we shall destroy these 
invaders!" He cried with enthusiasm. He began to run towrds Megatron, but 
stopped as a grenade landed right between his feet. "Royalty! Look out!"
    The clone looked down at the grenade, cried out, and blew to scrap before 
the ees of Inferno. His head landed on the ground and rolled over to 
Kitkat...."You......little.....bitch....."It said with its last ounce of 
energy, and then died. The head blanked out, a rather perfect trophy.
    "No! The Queen! .....You shall pay for this!" Inferno cried, took to the 
sky, and went as fast as he could fly. He saw a small being beneath him in 
the forest and went down. Apon landing he saw it was Darkmouse...a fimiliar 
face.

    "Excellent. Everything is going to plan. When Inferno arrives, and 
Terrorsaur, we can begin phase two. Hahahahahahah!" He bellowed sitting on 
his Command Chair.
    "Your a freak!" Adrax cried, who now resided within a steal cage 
suspended above a pit that was rather deep. He dangled back and forth.
    Megatron turned, "Silence! Your only alive because you know the access 
codes. Now shut up!"
